summary: Comprehensive frontend testing of MyDom Real Estate Platform completed. Core functionality working well with minor issues identified.

critical_bugs.issue: Frontend not accessible via public URL (https://estate-finder-20.preview.emergentagent.com) - shows 'Preview Unavailable' error
critical_bugs.impact: Users cannot access the application via public URL

ui_bugs.issue: Modal overlay prevents clicking submit button - ElementHandle.click timeout due to dialog overlay interception

passed_tests: Home page loads with white theme and deep red (#B91C1C) accents
Mydom logo displays with Playfair Display font styling
Navigation header contains all required links: Alqı-satqı, Kirayə, Günlük, Agentliklər, Yaşayış kompleksləri
Hero section with three category tabs (Alış, Kirayə, Günlük) works correctly
Category filtering updates URL parameters and listings display
Price formatting works correctly: AZN for sale, AZN/ay for rent, AZN/gün for daily
Public /agencies page accessible without login - shows 3 agency cards
Public /complexes page accessible without login - shows 3 complex cards with correct price format (AZN-dən)
Agency access code login works with RMX-2024
Agency dashboard loads successfully with statistics and listing management
Agency can add new listings via modal with image dropzone
'Sahibindən' badges display correctly on user listings
Agency badges (Premium Realty, Baku Homes, City Apartments) display correctly
Image dropzone component loads with correct Azerbaijani text
Create listing page accessible for logged-in users
All form fields present in listing creation (category, property type, price, etc.)
Supabase integration configured correctly in environment
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix public URL access issue - frontend service not properly mapped to external URL. Investigate nginx/ingress configuration. Fix modal overlay issue in user login preventing form submission.
